text: "While You See a Chance" is a 1980 song by English singer Steve Winwood and taken from his second studio album Arc of a Diver. It went to number 3 in Canada, number 7 in the United States, number 10 in the Netherlands and number 16 in Australia. Category:1980 songs Category:Steve Winwood songs Category:Joe Cocker songs
title: While You See a Chance
